message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a competitive price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice. How about we settle at $90? That's a fair deal for both of us.
I'm glad we're close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, so I'll offer it to you for $105.
